= Plasmid =

A plasmid is a small, circular DNA molecule that exists independently of the bacterial chromosome.

== Key Features ==
- Capable of autonomous replication
- Often carries beneficial genes (e.g., antibiotic resistance)
- Commonly used in genetic engineering as vectors
